node.html: ThinkFlow is an interactive mind-mapping tool that dynamically generates flashcards with questions and answers, integrates text-to-speech functionality, and provides a dyslexia-friendly mode for enhanced accessibility.

frontmatter.title: Microosft Power BI Desktop for Business Intelligence

node.html: A prototype to detect the presence of face masks in static images as well as in real-time video streams which was an essential in Covid era

frontmatter.title: Sentiment Analysis for Opioid Harm Reduction

node.html: Analyzing Reddit discussions on opioid harm reduction using NLP and data visualization to identify trends, sentiments, and risks associated with drug use.
Using Tableau to visualize trends and patterns in opioid-related data, enabling predictive analysis for overdose risk and harm reduction strategies.

AZ-900 (Microsoft Azure Fundamentals) covers core cloud concepts, Azure services, security, compliance, pricing, and support to build a foundational understanding of Microsoft Azure.
